name: FidgetSpinner
0:
”Alexa, ask Fidget Spinner to spin”
”Alexa, ask Fidget Spinner to give it a flick”
”Alexa, ask Fidget Spinner to spin my fidget spinner”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fidget spinner
des: Alexa can do pretty much anything. Of course, this includes spinning a fidget spinner. Watch your boredom vanish at speeds of 1,000 miles per hour as you ask Fidget Spinner to spin your fidget spinner. Although you may not be able to see the actual fidget spinner, believe her, it's there.
